mapper.insert: insert into projectattach (uuid, uploadpath, filename, filetype, proj_id) values(#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{proj_id})
mapper.select: select contract_write_source, related_proj, contract_write_target, m.member_no from contract c, project p, member m where c.related_proj = p.proj_id and c.contract_write_target and m.member_no = c.contract_write_target and contract_write_target = #{member_no}
